if (!window.onerror) window.onerror = function(message, url, lineNumber) {
    if (!window._earlyOnerrorException) {
        window._earlyOnerrorException = {message: message,
                                         url: url,
                                         lineNumber: lineNumber};

};

      <div id="content">
        
        <div class="padder">

          <div id="title" class="intro has-gcbadge">
            <div class="left">
              <h1>Clash of Clans</h1>
              <h2>By Supercell</h2>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
              <div class="gc-badge app-badge"><span>Game Center</span></div>
              
              <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/supercell/id488106216" class="view-more">View More by This Developer</a>
            </div>
            <p>Open iTunes to buy and download apps.</p>
          </div>

          <div class="center-stack">
            
            <div more-text="More" metrics-loc="Titledbox_Description" class="product-review">
  
    <h4>
      
      Description
    </h4>
    
  
  
    <p>Introducing: Clan Wars! Crush enemy clans in clan versus clan battles. Lead your clan to victory! Clash of Clans is an epic combat strategy game. Build your village, train your troops and battle with millions of other players online!<br /><br />PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.<br /><br />Over 1.5 Million 5 Star Reviews<br /><br />5/5  “This game is phenomenal”<br /><br />5/5  “If you were looking for a game to play that's fun and strategic this is better than any other game out there”<br /><br />Clash of Clans is an addictive mixture of strategic planning and competitive fast-paced combats. Raise an army of Barbarians, War Wizards, Dragons and other mighty fighters. Join a clan of players and rise through the ranks, or create your own Clan to contest ownership of the Realm. Driving back the goblins is just the first step - your quest isn't over until your clan reigns supreme over all others!<br /><br />= FEATURES =<br />- FREE TO PLAY<br />- Build your village into a undefeatable fortress<br />- Battle with players worldwide and take their Victory Points<br />- Join together with other players to form the ultimate Clan<br />- Fight against rival Clans in the epic Clan Wars<br />- 15 unique units with multiple levels of upgrades<br />- Defend your village with Cannons, Towers, Mortars, Bombs, Traps and Walls<br />- Fight against the Goblin King in an epic campaign through the realm<br /><br />Having any problems?  Any suggestions?  We would love to hear from you!  You can reach us at support at clashofclans.feedback@supercell.net <br /><br />Note: A network connection is required to play<br /><br />Privacy Policy:<br />http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/<br /><br />Terms of Service:<br />http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/</p>
  
  
</div>


            
            <div class="app-links"><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="https://gamesupport.supercell.net/hc/en-us/categories/7122-Clash-Of-Clans" class="see-all">Clash of Clans Support</a><a rel="nofollow" href="https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewEula?id=529479190" class="see-all">Application License Agreement</a></div>

            
            <div more-text="More" metrics-loc="Titledbox_What&#39;s New in Version 6.56.1" class="product-review">
  
    <h4>
      
      What's New in Version 6.56.1
    </h4>
    
  
  
    <p>Clan wars! The biggest update in Clash history is here!<br /><br />- Fight clan versus clan in strategic showdowns full of bonus loot!<br />- Fill your clan's War Log with the details of each epic fight!<br />- Participate in clan wars at no risk to your resources, shield or trophies. <br /><br />Clan castle renovation<br /><br />- Rally huge clan support with Clan Castle level 6!<br />- Clan Castles now protect war loot payouts and are lootable in battle!<br />- Higher level Clan Castles hold more loot. Collect it whenever you like!</p>
  
  
</div>

  <div class="toggle">
    
    <div metrics-loc="iPhone" num-items="5" class="content iphone-screen-shots mixed-orientation"><div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" class="portrait" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/19/7d/7b/197d7b9f-d02d-61fe-8d46-d5f86c5a2af0/screen568x568.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" class="landscape" src="http://a4.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple2/v4/30/67/fa/3067fa0a-82c8-b9e3-a8b2-0bf39f0095d2/screen568x568.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 3" class="landscape" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/2d/7b/5b/2d7b5b2b-6412-abb8-9cfa-d1ea2dd0e9c2/screen568x568.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 4" class="landscape" src="http://a4.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple4/v4/1f/d6/d1/1fd6d1c4-29ae-4110-0481-91fdf7a13c50/screen568x568.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 5" class="landscape" src="http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple4/v4/be/42/b7/be42b778-15f8-ff13-d872-ec34a5fab71e/screen568x568.jpeg" /></div></div></div><div metrics-loc="iPad" num-items="5" class="content src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/4b/a8/83/4ba883e1-2a8f-3083-5103-1ec26eec0f4c/screen480x480.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPad Screenshot 2" class="landscape" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple6/v4/09/ee/33/09ee331c-469a-70e6-008f-40ed4cc34bbe/screen480x480.jpeg" /></div><div class="lockup"><img alt="iPad Screenshot 3" class="landscape" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple6/v4/5e/f4/b2/5ef4b299-d100-3e2a-b4cc-af1a2615bfdd/screen480x480.jpeg" /></div></div></div>
  </div>
</div>


            
            <div class="customer-reviews">
  <h4>Customer Reviews</h4>

  
    
<div more-text="More" class="customer-review">
  

  
    
      
      <h5>
        
        <span class="customerReviewTitle">Great game with great producers</span>
        <div class='rating' role='img' tabindex='-1' aria-label='5 stars'><div><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span></div></div>

      </h5>
      
      <span class="user-info">by
        
          Picklernio
        
        
      </span>
    

    
  

  <p class="content" will-truncate-max-height="0" data-text-truncate-lines="5">
    Clash is an amazing game no doubt about that. But there are so many people asking that supercell make a new attack function search people and attack them. That however is a terrible idea because if such an update ever happened then the people, in first second and third place would lose hundreds of trophies in a matter of hours because people would only attack them, same with really low lvl people attacking one player as much as possible.<br/><br/>I am perfectly OK with how clash is right now, but me and my friends are starting to run out of space. Since more updates are coming out, I would guess that more items would come in to gameplay causing a need for extra space. a way to make profit off of this would make extra space available for in app purchase.<br/><br/> The new town builder is much better than jigsawing all my buildings around, (I know this is starting to sound like a complaint) but I would love it if you could save your base designs  i make fun bases and well, fortresses. I get tired of remaking my old base off a screenshot i take.<br/><br/>There are rumors about a wizard lord and new towns people. If these are incorrect, i and almost everybody I know would love to see those be added in future updates.<br/><br/>It would be nice to see a new dark elixir troop such as the hydra, which has been a running idea in the forums, so yeah<br/><br/>Thank you for the addicting and challenging game
  </p>

  
</div>

  
    
<div more-text="More" class="customer-review">
  

  
    
      
      <h5>
        
        <span class="customerReviewTitle">Best game ever</span>
        <div class='rating' role='img' tabindex='-1' aria-label='5 stars'><div><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span></div></div>

      </h5>
      
      <span class="user-info">by
        
          Dbydalek
        
        
      </span>
    

    
  

  <p class="content" will-truncate-max-height="0" data-text-truncate-lines="5">
    Okay so lets get a few things straight. <br/>1. You do not need to pay to be good. It takes times. Ive been playing since july, have 4 builders, and im level 90. I havent spent any money. All those that say money is neccessary are impatient people. <br/>2. Upgrade costs and time are no too much either. This too shows patience. No good game will have a max upgrade time of like a day. This games can be played for months and months and never get old. Stop being impatient!!!<br/>On the other hand, there are a few things id like to reccommend for future updates:<br/>1. A new troop or hero. The last one was the witch which was a long time ago. Also, a hero like a wizard king would be awesome!<br/>2. We should be able to save different base layouts, especially with clan wars. Its a pain rearraging your base every 3 days if your farming so we should be able to save our war base and our trophy base! <br/>3. More single player levels should be added so we can receive more gold. Also, the curret levels should regenerate gold and elixer over a certain amount of time, about 1-14 days depending on the difficulty. <br/>4. You should do more &quot;themes&quot; like you do for christmas and halloween. A theme for st patricks day, fourth of july, and valentines day would be awesome! Also a very special theme on the coc release date anniversary!<br/>Thanks and hopefully some of these can be take into consideration. Clash on!!!
  </p>

  
</div>

  
    
<div more-text="More" class="customer-review">
  

  
    
      
      <h5>
        
        <span class="customerReviewTitle">Good, but nothing is perfect.</span>
        <div class='rating' role='img' tabindex='-1' aria-label='4 stars'><div><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star">&nbsp;</span><span class="rating-star ghost">&nbsp;</span></div></div>

      </h5>
      
      <span class="user-info">by
        
          YWNGMU
        
        
      </span>
    

    
  

  <p class="content" will-truncate-max-height="0" data-text-truncate-lines="5">
    I have been playing C.O.C. For a long time, and throughout all three of my accounts I have had an enjoyable experience. But I'm not here to say its perfect or the best. I'm also not here to say what's good about it, I'm sure those guys in Finland know what's good, but the community knows what's not. My biggest complaint is the amount of time thing are to be upgraded, at times it takes days to upgrade certain buildings, I know one reason is so people will buy gems to get it done quicker, but honestly I would rather have prices triple or quadruple and buy resources instead of time, because honestly I come in, pay for resources, hit upgrade, and don't even consider the app until I see a notification. I really want to be involved more constantly, but lengthy times prevent that, if I could come in and grind on attacks all day then spend 20 minutes on upgrades, that would keep me buying more and more gems. Secondly, I wish the size of the maps could expand, similar to simcity or city ville. It would be awesome to have a map with 4 times the size of the current one (mind you with extra buildings to fill it of course).<br/>Lastly, and this would seem really simple, why not have air buildings? Just saying, more insentive to use troops like archers, wizards, drags, balloons, and minions.
  </p>

  
</div>

  

</div>

			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/support/ipod/">iPod + iTunes Support</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/airplay/">AirPlay</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/accessibility/other-products/">Accessibility</a></li>
		</ul>
	</div>
	<div id="dn-colc" class="column">
		<h3>Working with iTunes</h3>
		<ul>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/working-itunes/">Overview</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/working-itunes/enhance/">Enhance Your Content</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/working-itunes/sell-content/">Sell Your Content</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/working-itunes/market/">Market with iTunes</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/link/">Link to iTunes</a></li>
		</ul>
	</div>
	<div id="dn-cold" class="column last">
		<h3>iTunes Store</h3>
		<ul>
			<li><a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/browse/">Browse iTunes Store</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/genre/mobile-software-applications/id36?mt=8">Browse App Store</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/store">Buy Music Now</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://store.apple.com/us/browse/home/giftcards/itunes/gallery">Buy iTunes Gift Cards</a></li>
			<li><a href="https://buy.itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZFinance.woa/wa/redeemLandingPage">Redeem iTunes Gift Cards</a></li>
			<li><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunes/corporatesales/">iTunes Corporate Sales</a></li>
			<li><a href="https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewMultiRoom?cc=us&amp;fcId=496598350">Free Single of the Week</a></li>
		</ul>
	</div>
	<div class="capbottom"></div>
</div>

	</div><!--/breadory-->

  <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript"><!--

    var iTSMetricsCallbackFunction = function() {
	    ITSMetrics.reportingSuite = "appleitmswww,appleitmsus";
	    ITSMetrics.omniture = ITSMetrics.createBaselineOmnitureObject();
	    
	    ITSMetrics.isPageMetricsEnabled=true;
	    
	    
	    
	
	    /* Page Metrics */
	    ITSMetrics.omniture.pageName="SEO-Software-US-Supercell-Clash of Clans-529479190";
ITSMetrics.omniture.channel="SEO";
ITSMetrics.omniture.prop22="HTML";
ITSMetrics.omniture.eVar22="HTML";
ITSMetrics.omniture.products="Supercell-Clash of Clans-529479190";

	    
	    
	    
	    /* User Agent */
	    var userAgentForMetrics = ITSMetrics.userAgentForMetrics();
	    ITSMetrics.omniture.prop12 = userAgentForMetrics;
	    ITSMetrics.omniture.eVar12 = userAgentForMetrics;
	    
	    // check if Game Center
	    var gcUserAgent = "GameCenter";
	    var isGameCenter = userAgentForMetrics.length >= gcUserAgent.length && userAgentForMetrics.substr(0, gcUserAgent.length) == gcUserAgent;
	    if (isGameCenter) {
	        // prepend "GameCenter" to page and channel name
	        if (ITSMetrics.omniture.pageName) ITSMetrics.omniture.pageName = "GameCenter-" + ITSMetrics.omniture.pageName;
	        if (ITSMetrics.omniture.channel) ITSMetrics.omniture.channel = "GameCenter-" + ITSMetrics.omniture.channel;
	    }
	    
	    
	    /* Browser Plugins */
	    ITSMetrics.shouldTrackBrowserPlugins = false;
	    
	    /* Pass-thru query params */
	    ITSMetrics.processQueryParameterInfoInCurrentRequest(ITSMetrics.omniture);
	    
	    if (ITSMetrics.isPageMetricsEnabled && ITSMetrics.isOmnitureSupportedOnClient()) {
	        ITSMetrics.emitPagePing = function() {
	            var s_code=ITSMetrics.omniture.t();
	            if (s_code) {
	                var containingDiv = document.createElement('div');
	                containingDiv.innerHTML = s_code;
	                document.body.appendChild(containingDiv);
	            }
	        };
	        its.x.addEventListener(window, 'load', function() { window.setTimeout(ITSMetrics.emitPagePing, 1) }, false );
	    }
    };

    if (!window["ITSMetrics"]){ 
	    iTSDefer.register(function() {
	        iTSMetricsCallbackFunction();
	    });
    } else {
        iTSMetricsCallbackFunction();
    }
--></script>
    <script>
        if (!window.its) {
            window.its = {};
        }
        window.its.markupLoadEndTime = new Date().getTime();
    </script>



</body>



</html>
